verses.verse: And thou<WH1121>, son of man<WH120>, prophesy<WH5012> unto the mountains<WH2022> of Israel<WH3478>, and say<WH559>, Ye mountains<WH2022> of Israel<WH3478>, hear<WH8085> the word<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068>.
Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>: Because the enemy<WH341> hath said<WH559> against you<WH1889>, Aha! and<WH5769>, The ancient high places<WH1116> are ours in possession<WH4181>;

therefore prophesy<WH5012>, and say<WH559>, Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>: Because<WH8074>, even because they have made you desolate, and swallowed you up<WH7602> on every side<WH5439>, that ye might be a possession<WH4181> unto the residue<WH7611> of the nations<WH1471>, and ye are taken up<WH5927> in the lips<WH8193> of talkers<WH3956>, and the evil report<WH1681> of the people<WH5971>;

therefore <WH2022>, ye mountains of Israel<WH3478>, hear<WH8085> the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH136>: Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH136> to the mountains<WH2022> and to the hills<WH1389>, to the watercourses<WH650> and to the valleys<WH1516>, to the desolate<WH8074> wastes<WH2723> and to the cities<WH5892> that are forsaken<WH5800>, which are become a prey<WH957> and derision<WH3933> to the residue<WH7611> of the nations<WH1471> that are round about<WH5439>;

therefore thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH136>: Surely in the fire<WH784> of my jealousy<WH7068> have I spoken<WH1696> against the residue<WH7611> of the nations<WH1471>, and against all Edom<WH123>, that have appointed<WH5414> my land<WH776> unto themselves for a possession<WH4181> with the joy<WH8057> of all their heart<WH3824>, with despite<WH7589> of soul<WH3824>, to cast it out<WH4054> for a prey<WH957>.

Therefore prophesy<WH5012> concerning the land<WH127> of Israel<WH3478>, and say<WH559> unto the mountains<WH2022> and to the hills<WH1389>, to the watercourses<WH650> and to the valleys<WH1516>, Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>: Behold<WH1696>, I have spoken in my jealousy<WH7068> and in my wrath<WH2534>, because ye have borne<WH5375> the shame<WH3639> of the nations<WH1471>:

therefore thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH136>: I have<WH5375> sworn<WH3027>, saying<WH1471>, Surely the nations that are round about<WH5439> you<WH5375>, they shall bear their shame<WH3639>.

But ye<WH2022>, O mountains of Israel<WH3478>, ye shall shoot forth<WH5414> your branches<WH6057>, and yield<WH5375> your fruit<WH6529> to my people<WH5971> Israel<WH3478>; for they are at hand<WH7126> to come<WH935>.
For <WH6437>, behold, I am for you, and I will turn unto you<WH5647>, and ye shall be tilled and sown<WH2232>;

and I will multiply<WH7235> men<WH120> upon you<WH1004>, all the house of Israel<WH3478>, even all of it<WH5892>; and the cities shall be inhabited<WH3427>, and the waste<WH2723> places shall be builded<WH1129>;

and I will multiply<WH7235> upon you man<WH120> and beast<WH929>; and they shall increase<WH7235> and be fruitful<WH6509>; and I will cause you to be inhabited<WH3427> after your former estate<WH6927>, and will do better<WH2895> unto you than at your beginnings<WH7221>: and ye shall know<WH3045> that I am Jehovah<WH3068>.

Yea <WH120>, I will cause men to walk<WH3212> upon you<WH5971>, even my people Israel<WH3478>; and they shall possess<WH3423> thee<WH5159>, and thou shalt be their inheritance, and thou shalt no more<WH3254> henceforth bereave them of children<WH7921>.
Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>: Because they say<WH559> unto you<WH398>, Thou land art a devourer of men<WH120>, and hast been a bereaver<WH7921> of thy nation<WH1471>;
therefore thou shalt devour<WH398> men<WH120> no more<WH7921>, neither bereave thy nation<WH1471> any more<WH5002>, saith the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>;

neither will I let thee hear<WH8085> any more the shame<WH3639> of the nations<WH1471>, neither shalt thou bear<WH5375> the reproach<WH2781> of the peoples<WH5971> any more<WH1471>, neither shalt thou cause thy nation to stumble<WH3782> any more<WH5002>, saith the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>.
Moreover the word<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068> came unto me<WH559>, saying,

Son <WH1121> of man<WH120>, when the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> dwelt<WH3427> in their own land<WH127>, they defiled<WH2930> it by their way<WH1870> and by their doings<WH5949>: their way<WH1870> before<WH6440> me was as the uncleanness<WH2932> of a woman in her impurity<WH5079>.

Wherefore I poured<WH8210> out my wrath<WH2534> upon them for the blood<WH1818> which they had poured<WH8210> out upon the land<WH776>, and because they had defiled<WH2930> it with their idols<WH1544>;

and I scattered<WH6327> them among the nations<WH1471>, and they were dispersed<WH2219> through the countries<WH776>: according to their way<WH1870> and according to their doings<WH5949> I judged them<WH8199>.

And when they came<WH935> unto the nations<WH1471>, whither they went<WH935>, they profaned<WH2490> my holy<WH6944> name<WH8034>; in that men said<WH559> of them<WH5971>, These are the people of Jehovah<WH3068>, and are gone forth<WH3318> out of his land<WH776>.
But I had regard<WH2550> for my holy<WH6944> name<WH8034>, which the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> had profaned<WH2490> among the nations<WH1471>, whither they went<WH935>.

Therefore say<WH559> unto the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>, Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH136>: I do<WH6213> not this for your sake<WH1004>, O house of Israel<WH3478>, but for my holy<WH6944> name<WH8034>, which ye have profaned<WH2490> among the nations<WH1471>, whither ye went<WH935>.

And I will sanctify<WH6942> my great<WH1419> name<WH8034>, which hath been profaned<WH2490> among the nations<WH1471>, which ye have profaned<WH2490> in the midst<WH8432> of them<WH1471>; and the nations shall know<WH3045> that I am Jehovah<WH3068>, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3068>, when I shall be sanctified<WH6942> in you before their eyes<WH5869>.
For I will take<WH3947> you from among<WH4480> the nations<WH1471>, and gather<WH6908> you out of all the countries<WH776>, and will bring<WH935> you into your own land<WH127>.
And I will sprinkle<WH2236> clean<WH2889> water<WH4325> upon you<WH2891>, and ye shall be clean: from all your filthiness<WH2932>, and from all your idols<WH1544>, will I cleanse you<WH2891>.

A new<WH2319> heart<WH3820> also will I give<WH5414> you<WH2319>, and a new spirit<WH7307> will I put<WH5414> within<WH7130> you<WH5493>; and I will take away the stony<WH68> heart<WH3820> out of your flesh<WH1320>, and I will give<WH5414> you a heart<WH3820> of flesh<WH1320>.
And I will put<WH5414> my Spirit<WH7307> within<WH7130> you<WH6213>, and cause you to walk<WH3212> in my statutes<WH2706>, and ye shall keep<WH8104> mine ordinances<WH4941>, and do them<WH6213>.
And ye shall dwell<WH3427> in the land<WH776> that I gave<WH5414> to your fathers<WH1>; and ye shall be my people<WH5971>, and I will be your God<WH430>.
And I will save<WH3467> you from all your uncleannesses<WH2932>: and I will call<WH7121> for the grain<WH1715>, and will multiply<WH7235> it<WH5414>, and lay no famine upon you<WH7458>.

And I will multiply<WH7235> the fruit<WH6529> of the tree<WH6086>, and the increase<WH8570> of the field<WH7704>, that ye may receive<WH3947> no more the reproach<WH2781> of famine<WH7458> among the nations<WH1471>.

Then shall ye remember<WH2142> your evil<WH7451> ways<WH1870>, and your doings<WH4611> that were not good<WH2896>; and ye shall loathe<WH6962> yourselves in your own sight<WH6440> for your iniquities<WH5771> and for your abominations<WH8441>.

Not for your sake do<WH6213> I this<WH5002>, saith the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH136>, be it known<WH3045> unto you<WH954>: be ashamed and confounded<WH3637> for your ways<WH1870>, O house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>.

Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>: In the day<WH3117> that I cleanse<WH2891> you from all your iniquities<WH5771>, I will cause the cities<WH5892> to be inhabited<WH3427>, and the waste<WH2723> places shall be builded<WH1129>.
And the land<WH776> that was desolate<WH8074> shall be tilled<WH5647>, whereas it was a desolation<WH8077> in the sight<WH5869> of all that passed by<WH5674>.

And they shall say<WH559>, This<WH1977> land<WH776> that was desolate<WH8074> is become like the garden<WH1588> of Eden<WH5731>; and the waste<WH2720> and desolate<WH8074> and ruined<WH2040> cities<WH5892> are fortified<WH1219> and inhabited<WH3427>.

Then the nations<WH1471> that are left<WH7604> round about<WH5439> you shall know<WH3045> that I<WH3068>, Jehovah, have builded<WH1129> the ruined<WH2040> places<WH5193>, and planted that which was desolate<WH8074>: I<WH3068>, Jehovah, have spoken<WH1696> it<WH6213>, and I will do it.

Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>: For this<WH1875>, moreover, will I be inquired of by the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>, to do<WH6213> it for them<WH7235>: I will increase them with men<WH120> like a flock<WH6629>.

As the flock<WH6629> for sacrifice<WH6944>, as the flock<WH6629> of Jerusalem<WH3389> in her appointed feasts<WH4150>, so shall the waste<WH2720> cities<WH5892> be filled<WH4392> with flocks<WH6629> of men<WH120>; and they shall know<WH3045> that I am Jehovah<WH3068>.
